description: Hugh Schofield looks for the truth behind Rumer Godden's The Greengage Summer in northern France.
title: My search for novelist Rumer Godden's famed French summer
title_page: My search for novelist Rumer Godden's famed French summer - BBC News
maintext: But the old wall is still there, and in the wall there is still a gate, and the gate still gives on to the reeds and willows. This is where Rumer Godden (Cecil in the book) came to walk and swim in 1923.
